Class Mazo

java.lang.Object
com.example.fpoe_50zo.model.deck.Mazo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMazo
public class Mazo extends Object implements IMazo
Represents the deck of 52 playing cards. This class manages creating, shuffling, and dealing cards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new Mazo.

  • Constructor Details

    • Mazo

      public Mazo()
      Constructs a new Mazo. It initializes a full 52-card deck and shuffles it.

  • Method Details

    • barajar

      public void barajar()
      Randomly shuffles the cards currently in the deck.
      Specified by:
      barajar in interface IMazo

    • tomarCarta

      public Carta tomarCarta() throws MazoVacioException
      Draws one card from the top of the deck. The "top" is considered the end of the list for efficient removal.
      Specified by:
      tomarCarta in interface IMazo
      Returns:
      the top card from the deck.
      Throws:
      MazoVacioException - if the deck is empty when trying to draw.

    • estaVacio

      public boolean estaVacio()
      Checks if the deck has any cards left.
      Specified by:
      estaVacio in interface IMazo
      Returns:
      true if the deck is empty, false otherwise.

    • cartasRestantes

      public int cartasRestantes()
      Gets the number of cards remaining in the deck.
      Specified by:
      cartasRestantes in interface IMazo
      Returns:
      the count of remaining cards.

    • agregarAlFinal

      public void agregarAlFinal(Carta carta)
      Adds a single card to the bottom of the deck. Used for the rule: "Las cartas del jugador eliminado deben enviarse al final del mazo".
      Specified by:
      agregarAlFinal in interface IMazo
      Parameters:
      carta - The card to be added (must not be null).

    • agregarAlFinal

      public void agregarAlFinal(List<Carta> cartasMesa)
      Adds a list of cards to the bottom of the deck. Used for the rule: "Si las cartas del mazo se terminan se deben tomar las cartas de la mesa... y dejarlas disponibles en el mazo."
      Specified by:
      agregarAlFinal in interface IMazo
      Parameters:
      cartasMesa - The list of cards to add to the bottom of the deck.
